name: The Hair Blush
description:
The Story

Join Sulkie as she embarks on another misadventure and meets the troubled wizard Renee.

Will they be able to worth together to recover Renee's missing spellbook? More importantly, what will become of their burgeoning friendship?

Features

In development, first three chapters available now!

Illustrations by Sulkie herself.

A poor girl who needs your help.

Still to Come

More chapters!

An interactive segment featuring Sulkie's investigative abilities.

Art book.

Remastered edition of The Great Path.

Maybe Sulkie and Renee will become friends?

Like Sulkie?

Follow Sulkie on Twitter (@SulkieB) to learn about her ongoing adventures in Waterdeep. Get live updates, have conversations with her, and take part in daily polls!
